SEARCH:

Klasse PlanStep

java.lang.Object
PlanStep
public class PlanStep extends Object
a PlanStep consists of an Action, a list of done Substitution and a state that is valid after the execution of the PlanStep

  • Feldübersicht

    Felder
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Feld
    Beschreibung
    private Action
    action
    the action that is done in this PlanStep
    private final int
    id
    unique id of this PlanStep
    private static int
    idCounter
    counter to set the id of the PlanSteps
    private ArrayList<Substitution>
    substitutions
    a list of the Substitutions performed in this PlanStep

    • PlanStep

      public PlanStep(Action action, ArrayList<Substitution> substitutions) throws IllegalArgumentException
      create a new PlanStep with a copy of a given Action and list of Substitutions
      Parameter:
      action - to perform and copy into new PlanStep
      substitutions - to perform and copy into new PlanStep
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if (action == null) or (substitutions == null) or (substitutions.contains(null))
